    • to_Spectrum

      public Spectrum to_Spectrum​(double time) throws PraatException
      Function: Create a time slice from the Spectrogram at the time nearest to 'time'. Return NULL in case of failure (no memory). Postconditions: result -> xmin == my ymin; // Lowest frequency; often 0. result -> xmax == my ymax; // Highest frequency. result -> nx == my ny; // Number of frequency bands. result -> dx == my dy; // Frequency step. result -> x1 == my y1; // Centre of first frequency band. for (iy = 1; iy <= my ny; iy ++) { result -> z [1] [i] == sqrt (my z [i] ['time']); result -> z [2] [i] == 0.0; }
      Throws:
      PraatException

    • getZ

      public double getZ​(int ix, int iy)
